column4: is anyone else on hardy having this mp3 problem, the only on that can play mp3's so far is vlc, which is terrible as a music browser, i have downloaded xmms, but it does even open its gui when i try to run it,
i play mp3 with Rhythmbox, no problem
yeah, i used to also, until i upgraded
keep use it :p
until i upgraded....
for some reason it no longer works, although i have installed rrestricted extras
oh, rhythmbox no longer starts?
i dont think xmms2 have any gui..
you can try re-installl rhythmbox and the mp3 codec package
which one is the mp3 codec package
im not sure
perhaps 'gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly'
install the "GStreamer extra plugins"
what do u mean extra, i see good bad ugly no extra
open a command line, type: $ 'sudo apt-get install gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly'
i have that package already and i reinstalled it
oh then it should work... =/
you have "Ubuntu restricted extras" installed? I don't have that, I have "GStreamer extra plugins"
are u on hardy
that package your talking about is it a medibunut
I don't use medibunto. I use Ubuntu 8.04, and I have "GStreamer extra plugins"
medibuntu isnt a distro its a package libary
oh... i don't think i have it
